org.springframework.validation
Class ObjectError

java.lang.Object
  org.springframework.context.support.DefaultMessageSourceResolvable
      org.springframework.validation.ObjectError
All Implemented Interfaces:
MessageSourceResolvable, java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
FieldError
public class ObjectError
extends DefaultMessageSourceResolvable

Encapsulates an object error, i.e. a global reason for rejection.

Normally, an ObjectError has a single code for message resolution.

Since:
10.03.2003
Author:
Juergen Hoeller
See Also:
FieldError, Serialized Form

This is only meant to be used by subclasses like FieldError.
